item.description:
Because the owner of Maxie's does not wish to tie up so many tables on Easter, he has decided that we are not welcome to have our breakfast there (see if I eat there again!)
So, we will be having breakfast at my house in Sharon that morning.

Borderland is right down the street so the walk, (weather permitting) is still on.
11-1ish, April 8, 2012
Food will be provided
$10 per person

Limited to the first 20

Please park at the high school across the street,

Hope to see you there
item.name: Change of Venue for the Pesach Brunch and Walk
